name: Fashion Pet Makeover Games
description:
~~~~Hurry up! The Fashion Pet show is about to begin~~~~

Download ***Fashion Pet Makeover***! Help the Pet to look trendy for the mega show. Can you help out with this big event? It’s Showtime!

*The Adorable Pet needs a Makeover and Spa. Dress up your pets with adorable outfits and accessories!
Be ready to show your fashionable taste with your favorite pet. Dress up them for a big event. Puppy pet needs an amazing SPA and makeover. Help them to choose perfect outfits. Explore the world of a real fashion pet star. It’s time to help the pets compete in talent shows, Show is going to start. Hurry up!

*Pet can’t wait to be all dressed up! Pick up the perfect clothes and accessories to make them the most adorable and glamorous pets in the fashion show. It is a chance of a lifetime to become the pet star. Play with fun!

Exciting Game Features:
* DRESS UP - Customize pet with dozens of style options
* MAKEUP SALON - Polish your Puppy pet for the Big show’
* SPA SALON – Lots of amazing Spa activities. Pet will look so shiny
* TALENT SHOW - Perform in different pet talent award show challenges
* PET CHARACTERS - Choose the different pet characters as you want
* FASHIONISTA- Show off your fashionista in pet makeover and dress-up show challenge!
* RED CARPET – Steal the show on the red carpet! Let’s do it now

*Beautiful Pet will win your heart. It will be looking gorgeous fashion star, Don’t miss out on the Fun! Download “Fashion Pet Makeover Games” and become greatest pet superstar.

Leave a review and let us know what you think about this fun game. We will use feedback In our upcoming updates!

For more news and details:
